attributes.action: All workers to know basic first aid.
attributes.background:
100,000 people every year in the UK die of sudden cardiac arrest. Unfortunately there are still people out there who do not know basic first aid and I feel that these statistics could be greatly improved if all workers were trained in first aid. 
Be a lifesaver not a spectator.

rejection.details:
This would be a decision for employers. 

You might like to consider signing this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/241887
